korean: 오늘 반기 평가 결과를 받았는데 생각보다 좋은 점수를 받았다.
아침에 팀장님한테 회의실로 오라는 메시지 받고 엄청 떨렸어.
상사가 최근 프로젝트에서 내 역할을 높이 평가해주셨다.
특히 문제 해결 능력이랑 팀워크가 좋았다고 하셨어.
부족한 부분도 지적받았지만 발전할 수 있는 방향을 제시해주셔서 도움이 됐다.
시간 관리랑 우선순위 설정을 좀 더 잘해야 한대.
평가 끝나고 동료들이 축하해줘서 기분 좋았어.
다음 평가 때는 더 좋은 결과를 받을 수 있도록 노력해야겠다.
책도 좀 읽어보고 시간 관리 앱도 써봐야겠어.
이번 평가가 동기부여가 돼서 더 열심히 하고 싶다.
english: I got my semi-annual performance review today, and the score was better than I expected.
I got a message this morning from my team leader asking me to come to the meeting room, and I was super nervous.
My boss gave me high marks for my role in the recent project.
They specifically said my problem-solving skills and teamwork were good.
They also pointed out areas I need to work on and suggested ways to improve, which was helpful.
They said I need to work on time management and prioritization.
Honestly, I can't argue with that.
After the review, my coworkers congratulated me and it felt really nice.
I'll work hard so I can get even better results next time.
I should make a plan to improve the areas they pointed out.
Maybe I'll read some books and try using a time management app.
This review really motivated me and I wanna work even harder.
